title: Journal After...
author: JGray
text:
Today, I decided to post the comments after the comic itself was posted instead of the other way around.

We're coming up on the end of this storyline. The next one will have more action. Also? Shopping.

replies.author: Ayra*Guest*
replies.text: Well... at least she flung her AWAY from the cliff. That's got to be worth something... right?

replies.author: KS Claw*Guest*
replies.text: yeah, that's what I figured would happen.

replies.author: Uhl*Guest*
replies.text: So no accidental falling or pushing off the cliff, and yes, Theresa DOES feel better now. And for you, Chrys. Quest complete.

replies.author: Katy*Guest*
replies.text: The backgrounds on panels 2 & 3 are breathtaking ... the colours are amazing.
